001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.HistoryLogProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006
007import java.math.BigInteger;
008
009@HistoryLogProps(
010    opCode = 82,
011    displayName = "Factory Reset"
012)
013public class FactoryResetHistoryLog extends HistoryLog {
014    
015    
016    public FactoryResetHistoryLog() {}
017    public FactoryResetHistoryLog(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum) {
018        super(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum);
019        this.cargo = buildCargo(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum);
020        
021    }
022
023    public int typeId() {
024        return 82;
025    }
026
027    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
028        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == 26);
029        this.cargo = raw;
030        parseBase(raw);
031        
032    }
033
034    public static byte[] buildCargo(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum) {
035        return HistoryLog.fillCargo(Bytes.combine(
036            new byte[]{82, 0},
037            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSec),
038            Bytes.toUint32(sequenceNum)));
039    }
040    
041}
